mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y') member, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUPPORTERS S JOIN MEMBER M ON (S.REF_UNO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y') supporters, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CREATE_SETTING WHERE STATUS = 'W') createSetting, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ERROR_BOARD E JOIN BOARD B ON(E.REF_BNO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE E.SOLVED = 'W' AND B.STATUS = 'Y') errorBoard, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = 'B') bulletinBoard, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = 'Q') qnaBoard FROM DUAL;
